sentences.sentence: Now simply close the wire lock and you have a very durable, totally weedless tube bait.
sentences.translation: 现在关闭导线锁，并且你有一个非常耐久。

sentences.sentence: To the right and left, thefamous weedless lawns studded with "specimen" trees(each of a different variety) rolled away to long rangesof grass crested with elaborate cast-iron ornaments;
sentences.translation: 左右两侧是没有杂草的一流草坪，其间点缀着“标本”树（每一株都属不同品种），一直起伏绵延至漫长的草地，草地最高处装有精心制作的铸铁装饰。
